website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Tennis Classic is among the many sought-after Nike vintage tennis sneakers in the market today. After more than 35 years, this timeless silhouette, with its no-frills and traditional tennis shoe design, still remains in demand.With an affordable price, the brand’s avid fans continue to favor this shoe despite receiving negative feedback about its quality and durability. Emphasizing on the sneaker’s aesthetics, comfort, and versatility as well as its maker’s well-established name, most rate the shoe's overall look and performance satisfactory and its minor imperfections tolerable or insignificant.
pros: A large number considers the shoe as very comfortable
The Nike Tennis Classic receives lots of compliments for its vintage look and striking colorways
This versatile shoe can be worn with anything, dressed up or dressed down, making it a perfect everyday shoe, as noted by the majority of the reviewers
Several are pleased with the adequate support the sneaker provides
Many praise the shoe for its lightweight construction
When worn for sightseeing, for work, or for school, the sneaker performs well, according to a few wearers
The Tennis Classic is a good value for money, as stated by some users
A few wide-footed purchasers mention that they are pleased with the shoe’s snug and cozy fit
Nike’s Tennis Classic has good flexibility without losing its support
cons: More than a handful of dismayed purchasers consider the shoe as being made with low-quality materials
The Tennis Classic’s sole separates from its upper and its leather creases after several months of usage, as reported by several
The sneaker feels tight and stiff during the break-in period
In addition, the shoe also takes a while to be broken in, as noticed by many Nike fans
Few users advise that the shoe got dirty easily

customer_reviews.title: falling apart. Don't have anyone to contact for warranty concerns.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these shoes for less than twelve hours and the left shoes is already separating. I purchased these from Softwater products... I cannot find any contact information from them to notify them of the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Saint04

customer_reviews.title: This is very poor quality for what is a Nike shoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Nike Tennis Classic CS Retro Shoes sku=683613-104-13 on November 24, 2017 for a Christmas gift for my son who started CNA class in late March 2018. He has only wore these for 5 weeks and the side has ripped out of them. This is very poor quality for what is a Nike shoes. I would hope the seller will either replace or provide a full refund. I will update my review once this has been resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Goetze

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed beyond belief!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a Nike girl, and I’ve never had an issue with the shoes...until now. I got these in September, and now three months later, the sole is separating from the shoe and there are splits where the toe bends. Very cheaply made product. I wish I hadn’t purchased them! So disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh As Bakery Buns
customer_reviews.text: These were my fifth pair of Nikes to date, and I love them. As with all the Nikes I own, I waterproofed them after making sure they’d fit and before wearing them outside (shameless plug for Herman Survivors Heavy-Duty Silicone Waterproofer), and these things look crisp as a Kit Kat and feel great. Especially if you’re on your feet a lot, from my experience, these will serve you well.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Steele

customer_reviews.title: WHY DOES LOOKING SO COOL HAVE TO BE SO PAINFUL
customer_reviews.text: THE BACK OF THE SHOE RIDES UP A LITTLE HIGH FOR ME. I AM STILL IN THE BREAK IN PERIOD SO IT RUBS ON MY ANKLE A BIT. WHY DOES LOOKING SO COOL HAVE TO BE SO PAINFUL?
customer_reviews.author: SLK47

customer_reviews.title: ... fault for not double checking my size in shoes like this. I ordered my size in open toe ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a bit small but it was my fault for not double checking my size in shoes like this. I ordered my size in open toe heel thinking it would be the same. I don't usually wear shoes like this so that was my fault.

customer_reviews.title: Shoe

customer_reviews.title: Really cool
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fresh alternative to the Superstar trend and came across these Classics. I'm admittedly pretty brand-loyal to Nike so this was even more of a win. These are comfy, fit tts, and look pretty fly. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Wright

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Very comfy. Arrived on time. Box was a little broken but shoes are 👍

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for pickleball, which is played on a tennis court. They started coming apart at the sole in less than four months. They still look new until you see the front or turn them over. If you just want them for show, then buy them. If you are looking for a quality tennis shoe, DO NOT buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Genereux

customer_reviews.title: ... Nike shoes are the size I ordered and fit fine but not this pair

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves these. UPDATED review
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves basic white shoes. He said these are his favorite he has purchased and at a decent price. UPDATED: I initially thought these shoes were 5 stars but now I rate them 2 stars. These shoes were purchased in April, it is now mid August and the shoe sole is separating from the shoe. These are not durable and husband is looking to replace them yet again.

customer_reviews.title: These aren't real NIKES, I will keep them because ...
customer_reviews.text: These aren't real NIKES, I will keep them because I've worn them for a week already and didn't bother to make sure they were real when I unboxed them but they are knock offs. The sole of the shoe is visibly glued to the leather, the tongue of the shoe doesn't even have an official NIKE tag, the stitching is very messed up and is already tearing in certain places after wearing them a couple of times. Do Not buy these shoes, go to the nike website and spend the full amount if you want them. This is a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: evan pokrandt

customer_reviews.title: which fit perfect. However
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size bigger than usual, which fit perfect. However, these shoes need low cut socks. Ankle socks are too short & these shoes will kill the back and front of your foot. Maybe after some wear & tear it'll get better :) i like them tho!
